He has good experience in this field and is well-known in the neighborhood, since he is the only person with such a profession in the surrounding area.  Samer is requesting a youth loan of 2,400 USD. He will use this loan to pay the annual rent of his shop. Samer is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he may expand his shop in the future and add more products to his selling lists.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent of his shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase plank timber and other materials to meet clients' order on time

loans.name: Memunatu

texts.en:
Meet 40-year-old Memunatu from Waterloo, Eastern area in Freetown. She is married with 4 children. She began her business because she wants to be self dependent and educate her children. For the past 15 years, Memunatu has established her local food business. She works at the business for 12 hours per day, 7 days per week. She says that the main challenges to her business are price inflation and competition in the market.

Memunatu requires a loan in order to purchase more items like fish, cassava bread and cooking oil. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and help her family. In the future, Memunatu plans to own the biggest shop in the community. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more items like fish, cassava bread and cooking oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Isidora

texts.es: Isidora es una señora de 53 años de edad, originaria la ciudad de Estelí. Una humilde madre soltera de 2 hijos, estudio para periodismo lo cual no lo ejerció. Hoy en día es una mujer asalariada debido a que ayuda en la cabina de una radio de la ciudad. Ella a pesar de no tener un esposo quien la apoye, se vale de sí misma para salir adelante y ofrecerles a sus hijos una calidad de vida cada vez mejor. Su meta próxima es mantener un mejor sistema de saneamiento. Solicita el crédito para mejorar las condiciones de saneamiento en su vivienda, con el fin de brindarle una mejor condición de vivir en su hogar. Estima que el crédito le será de ayuda ya que proporcionara una mejor calidad de vida a su familia con una mejor higiene y seguridad. Su plan futuro es mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Isidora, age 53, is from the city of Estelí.  She is the humble single mother of two children.  She studied journalism, but she never practiced it.  She now works as a salaried helper at a radio booth in the city.

In spite of not having a husband to support her, she does well on her own in order to get ahead and provide her children with an improving quality of life.  Her next goal is to maintain a better sanitary system.

She is requesting the loan in order to improve the sanitary conditions in her house.  She will do this in order to provide her household with better living conditions.  She believes that the loan will be helpful to her because it will give her family a better quality of life with better hygiene and safety.  Her plan for the future is to improve the infrastructure of her home.

loans.use: to improve the sanitary conditions in her house.

loans.name: Shaista

texts.en:
Shaista, aged 22, is a married woman. She has one son. Her husband owns an embroidery shop in the market. It is the only source of income for the family. He needs to purchase a variety of new embroidery material to resell. This will help him to offer more variety to his customers and to continue his work efficiently and professionally. However, due to a lack of money he finds it difficult. 

His wife, Shaista, has requested for a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan with the goal of helping her husband. He will purchase an embroidery machine and a variety of new embroidery material. Shaista is happy that she will be able to help her husband with the loan amount. She is thankful to Kiva lenders and to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase an embroidery machine and a variety of new embroidery material.

loans.name: Twesiga Mukama Group

texts.en: Mariam, a member of Twesiga Mukama group, is a single hard-working lady, aged 24 years.  She owns a salon and a beauty shop from which she earns money for a living.  Miriam hopes to get income and expand her salon to a higher level.  This has, however, been hindered by limited income.  It is triggering her desire to acquire a big loan on an individual basis to buy cosmetics that she will sell to her customers.  Especially at this festive season, she hopes to make big sales. She is hard working and thanks Kiva lenders for being supportive.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics for the beauty shop

loans.name: Ketevan

texts.en:
Ketevan is 33 years old and from the Samtredia district. She lives with her parents, her brother and his family. Her father works physically and this is the only source of income for such a large family. Ketevan decided to start her own business and requested a loan. 

The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 1,000 Gel for a trading business. With the received credit she will purchase clothes and then resell at a higher price. The Start Up program will be a great support for the family as she will be able to generate income.

loans.use: to begin trading in clothes.

loans.name: Cahid

texts.en:
Cahid, a 20-year–old IDP (internally displaced person) who lives with his family in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement, raises and sells sheep for meat.  People use mutton for traditional dishes like kebabs, dolmas, pilovs, etc. A very hard-working person who has been doing this for two years, Cahid puts a lot of effort into this activity because he wants to support his parents financially. His father helps him in the business. 

Cahid is requesting a loan of 1000 AZN to purchase 10 sheep in order to sell more meat in winter. He is optimistic about this loan because in winter, more people consume meat due to the holidays, and restaurants enjoy increased patronage.

loans.use: to purchase 10 sheep

loans.name: Muna

texts.en:
Muna is 38 years old; she lives in a small house in Gaza with her husband and six children. Four of them attend the public primary school and two of them are still in kindergarten.

For the past five years, she has run a food market that she rents; she hopes in the future to buy a grocery. This business has helped the family income because her husband works in a public institution, which pays low salaries. This is especially important because they are a big family and need the income to take care of their kids.

Muna sells different kinds of foodstuffs, like soft drinks, cookies and kids’ stuff. She asked Ryada for this loan to buy goods to sell and shelves for her food market.

Muna is very grateful to everyone who helps her. The one who appears in the photo is her husband Khaled. For cultural reasons she can’t publish her photos online, so she apologizes.

loans.use: to buy goods to sell, and shelves for her food market.

loans.name: Al-Maha Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Maha, and it is comprised of four ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. Hanan is a 31-year-old woman who lives in Sana'a, Yemen. She is an entrepreneur, and she has been making shoes and belts for many years. She is totally dependent on the income from this business to feed her family and to cover their living expenses. She took a loan of 80,000 YER from Al-Amal Microfinance Bank. Her purpose in taking the loan was to purchase industrial material for making belts and shoes.

This loan will help her to meet the demand of her clients in providing the types of traditional belts that they require. She hopes to improve her business and increase her profit.

loans.use: to purchase industrial material for making belts and shoes.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, de 36 años, es madre soltera de 02 hijos de 15 y 05 años, ellos son su motivo de inspiración y esfuerzo a diario para poder brindarles lo mejor en educación y alimentación: Ella vive en casa de su madre a lado su hermana, hijos y su padre. El trabajo de Elizabeth consiste en la venta de gaseosas  y helados de frutas regionales desde la casa de su madre, para eso cuenta con una congeladora de su propiedad. Trabaja así desde hace más de 02 años y lo realiza  sola logrando abastecerse con lo que hace. Considera rentable su negocio por las buenas ganancias que le deja. Le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene tiempo disponible para poder realizar múltiples actividades en su hogar. Este será el préstamo número 07 con Kiva, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará productos para vender en su negocio, entre las cosas que comprará están, gaseosas al por mayor y helados, ya que desea implementar su negocio para tener mas productos que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 36 years old and a single mother of two children, ages 5 and 15. She says that her children are her inspiration, and that she works hard every day to give them the best nutrition and education possible. 

Elizabeth lives in her mother’s home, together with her sister, children and her father. She works from the home selling carbonated drinks and ice cream flavored with local fruits, and she keeps her products in a freezer that she owns. Elizabeth says that she has worked like this for two years, and is able to do so only because she manages to stock up with the products she makes.

Elizabeth considers her business to be profitable because she is left with a good income. She says that what she likes about her business is that she has time available to do other things in her home.

This is Elizabeth’s seventh Kiva loan. She says that she is very happy knowing that she will have financial support to move ahead with her business. Elizabeth will use this loan for 2,500 PEN to buy products at wholesale prices such as carbonated drinks and ice cream. She hopes to expand her business and have more products to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy carbonated drinks and ice cream at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en: Hassan is an 18-year-old single man, who is responsible for earning a living for the five members of his family. He is their sole breadwinner, and he puts a lot of effort into expanding and developing his business to make sure that he can meet all of his family's needs and requests. Hassan started his current espresso cafe business in January 2013. His work is going on fine because of his cleanliness and the diversity of products served. In addition to coffee, he sells Saj Manakish (special traditional bread), cooked beans (served as a morning breakfast meal), and hookah. The special thing about his location is that his is the only cafe in the centre that his business is established in. He has acquired a YOUTH loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to develop his business through increasing the number of hookahs. This will increase his income and improve his living conditions. Hassan hopes to keep on expanding his business and will work on opening a bigger cafe in the future.

loans.use: to develop his business by increasing the number of hookahs so as to increase his income.

loans.name: Miriam Maria

texts.es:
Doña Mirian es una mujer adulta de 54 años de edad, es casada y madre de 4 hijos los cuales están casados trabajan por aparte y en hogares aparte. Su grado de educación es de primaria completa la cual con mucho esfuerzo, apoyo y sacrificio apoyada por sus padres pudo culminar ya que ellos eran de escasos recursos y la parte financiera no era apta para seguirla apoyando en sus estudios. Ella se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de hortalizas, productos orientales entre otros pero su especialidad es el cultivo de guayaba ya que es una fruta muy comercial y con mucha demanda en el mercado siendo sus mayores clientes la asociación de productores donde su producto es entregado semanal mente practicado este rubro desde hace 8 años. También se dedica a la cría y engorde de cerdos como una entrada extra de efectivo en su hogar ayudando a cubrir con las necesidades básicas. Sus cultivos de guayaba están ubicados a 4 kilómetros de distancia desde su casa de habitación a la cual en compañía de su esposo se trasladan en autobús para poder asistir, limpiar y fumigar sus cultivos de guayaba.
Sus metas son las de cultivar otra variedad de producto en su propiedad para tener y ofrecer una mejor y mayor variedad ya que es mejor no depender de un solo producto. Por lo que ella ha solicitado financiamiento para la compra de fertilizantes y otros insumos agrícolas con los que podrá asistir sus cultivos de guayaba mejorando sus ingresos y la técnica de cultivo.
texts.en:
Miriam is a 54 year-old married woman.  She has 4 children who are married and working, and live in separate households.  Miriam has an elementary school education.  She was able to obtain this education thanks to the effort, support and sacrifice of her parents.  They did not have much money and so were not able to continue to support her in her education.  Miriam is a farmer who cultivates vegetables and oriental products, among other items, but her specialty is growing guava.  This fruit can be sold, and there is a lot of demand for it in the market.  Her main customer is the producer's association, where her product is delivered weekly.  She's been in this line of work for 8 years.

Miriam also raises and fattens pigs as a means of earning extra income for the household.  This income helps cover the basic household expenses.  Miriam's guava crops are located 4 kilometers from her home.  Her husband travels on a bus with her to help care for the crops, clear the land, and fumigate the guava crops.  

Miriam's goals are to cultivate more varieties of products on her property so that she can have a greater variety of products to sell.  This would be better than relying on just one product to sell.  Miriam has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and other farming supplies to help her tend to her guava crops, and improve her cultivation techniques and her income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her guava crops

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назире 53 года. Она трудолюбивая женщина с отдаленного региона. Назира как и другие местные жители своего района занимается скотоводством уже более 12 лет. В ее регионе основным источником дохода является скотоводство. Назира очень нуждалась в поддержке, когда начинала свой бизнес. Благодаря поддержке своего мужа, она смогла развевать бизнес. Данное время она уже опытный бизнес леди в сфере скотоводства. Назира имеет большой огород, где выращивает сено для скота. Таким образом, она получает больше дохода, так как часть корма скота она выращивает сама. Остальную часть она покупает. Назира откармливает скот 2 или 3 месяца. Затем она продает на местном рынке. Полученный доход она использует для обеспечения детей. Назира хочет увеличить оборотный капитал. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки скота и сено. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Nazira is 53 years old. She is a hardworking woman from a remote region. Nazira, like other local residents of her region, has been involved with raising livestock for more than 12 years. In her area, the main source of income is livestock. Nazira very much needed support when she began her business. Thanks to the support of her husband, she was able to develop her business. Now, she is an experienced business lady in the sphere of animal husbandry.

Nazira has a large garden, where she grows hay for the livestock. In this way, she gets more income, since she grows part of the livestock feed herself. The remaining part is purchased. Nazira feeds the livestock for two or three months. At that time, she sells at the local market.

She uses the earned income for the care of her children. Nazira wants to increase her working capital. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni to buy livestock and hay.

loans.use: to buy livestock and feed

loans.name: Davron

texts.ru: Даврон жизнерадостный и добродушный мужчина в возрасте 30 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. У него очень дружная семья. Живут они в сельской местности. Чтобы иметь доход в семье, все члены семьи пытаются трудиться и зарабатывать деньги. Каждый трудится как может. Сам Даврон занимается своим делом. Он занимается животноводством, а также выращиванием сельхозкультуры. Его бизнес приносит Даврону доход. Но основным бизнесом всё-таки является животноводство. В этом деле ему также помогает жена. Она ухаживает за скотом, а также продаёт полученное от скота молоко. Бизнес животноводства приносит Даврону хороший и стабильный доход. Поэтому он желает расширить этот бизнес. Ему необходимо купить ещё несколько голов скота для выращивания и дальнейшей продажи. Для этого Даврон обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Он надеется, что этот бизнес будет успешно расширяться и приносить больше прибыли, чтобы качественно удовлетворять нужды семьи. Даврон заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку
texts.en:
Davron is a debonair and good-natured man of 30. He is married and has three children. He has a very friendly family. They live in the countryside. In order to have an income for the family, all the family members are trying to work and earn money. Everyone works as he is able.

Davron himself is engaged in his own business. He is involved in raising animals, and also growing crops. This business brings income to Davron, but the core business is still livestock. In this work, he is helped by his wife. She cares for the livestock, and also sells the milk gathered from them. The livestock business brings Davron a good and stable income. Therefore, he wishes to expand this business. It is necessary for him to buy a few more heads of livestock for raising and future sale.

For this, Davron applied to Arvand and wants to receive a loan to buy livestock. He hopes that this business will successfully expand and bring more profits, in order to meet the family's needs in a high quality manner. Davron thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 45-year-old Kadiatu from Waterloo eastern rural area in Freetown. She is married and blessed with three children. She started a business to take care of her family. 

Kadiatu runs a food stand business at home; she sells rice, onions, and cooking seasoning. She has been running this business for 25 years now. She works at the business throughout the week, from morning to night. Kadiatu says that the main challenge to her business is the price of transportation and insufficient finances to expand her business.

Kadiatu has requested a loan in order to buy more cooking items like rice, onions, and cooking seasoning. The extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children and increase her business. In the future, she plans to expand her business. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy more cooking items like rice, onions, and cooking seasoning.

loans.name: Risolat

texts.en:
Risolat is 39 years old and married with four children. Being a responsible mother, Risolat works hard every day to generate income so that she can cover her daily costs and send some of her children to school. 

She is dedicated to the farming business, growing watermelons, wheat, and onions on her own land. In order to contribute to improving her family's living standards, she has worked hard from early morning until late evening for eight years. Risolat has additional income from animal husbandry. 

 Risolat would like to develop her business, which is why she is asking for a loan in the amount of $3,000 to purchase mineral fertilizer and seeds for the new planting season. She hopes that KIVA lenders won’t reject her loan and she thanks lenders in advance for their generosity.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizer and seeds for the new planting season

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 30-year-old single young man from Gaza city. He lives with his parents in a humble house. Ibrahim works as an employee in the public sector and he gets a low income. A few weeks ago, Ibrahim had an accident and he injured his hand. He urgently needs to have surgery so he can go back to his normal life.

Ibrahim took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to pay the medical costs for his hand. This loan will help Ibrahim to pay part of the urgent expenses he has. Ibrahim appears in the photo.

loans.use: to pay the medical costs for his hand

loans.name: Jargalmaa

texts.en: Jargalmaa is 40 years old and lives with her husband and parents-in-law in an apartment in Ih Toiruu, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband works at a local trading company. Jargalmaa graduated as a tailor and worked in a tailoring company for 7 years after her graduation. She also worked as an assistant in Japan with her husband for 4 years until 2012 when she started her business of selling used mobile phones at a local mobile phone sales centre with a little money saved from working there. She is now requesting for a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to purchase used phones from South Korea to sell at her rental booth. She is a hardworking, determined and welcoming lady.

loans.use: to purchase used phones from South Korea to sell at her rental booth.

loans.name: Dilrabo

texts.ru: Дилрабо добродушная женщина из сельской местности, которая стремиться для благополучия своей семьи. Она замужем и воспитывает своих детей в духе патриотизма.  Дилрабо 6 лет назад начала свой бизнес купле продажей одежды на местном рынке. Она имеет свою торговую точку на местном рынке. Она в основном продает детскую одежду, так как спрос на детскую одежду больше чем на мужские или женские одежды на местном рынке. Она должна обновить товар на новый сезон и привлечь больше клиентов, так как ей необходимо зарабатывать больше денег для обеспечения своих детей. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 сомони для покупки детской одежды для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие. Она мечтает, чтобы ее дети были образованными людьми.
texts.en:
Dilrabo is a good-natured woman from the countryside, who is striving for the well-bring of her family. She is married and is raising her children in the spirit of patriotism. Six years ago, Dilrabo began her own business buying and selling clothing at a local market. She has her own trade spot at the market. She mainly sells children's clothing, since the demand for children's clothing is greater than that for men's or women's clothing at the local market.

She has to renew her goods for the new season and to attract more customers, since she needs to earn more money to take care of her children.

She is requesting a loan of 4,000 somoni to buy children's clothing for the new season.

She dreams that her children will be educated people.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing to increase her working capital

loans.name: Sabreen

texts.en:
Sabreen is 30 years old; she lives in Gaza with her husband and she has two children who attend kindergarten.

 For the past five years, she has run her own grocery store with help from her husband who works also as a private employee; this grocery store helps them move forward and it ensures another income source for the family, especially when expenses increase.

Sabreen sells different kinds of food stuffs, like soft drinks, sugar, flour, and other kinds of supplies. She hopes that this youth loan will allow her to buy a refrigerator, electric generator, and shelves; she needs the electric generator because electricity in the Gaza area is constantly interrupted.  

Sabreen is very grateful to everyone who helps her. The one who appears on the photo is her husband Mahmoud. For cultural reasons she can’t publish her photos online, so she apologizes.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator, electric generator, and shelves

loans.name: Mashrafkhon

texts.ru: Машрафхон целеустремленная женщина. Она родилась в 1966 года. Машрафхон замужем и на воспитании имеет одного сына. Она более 6 лет работает в средней школе бухгалтером. Машрафхон имеет средне -специальное образование. Она честно выполняет свою работу и имеет хорошую репутацию среди местного населения. Ее муж бизнесмен. Машрафхон и ее муж постепенно улучшают условию проживания. Она планирует отремонтировать свой дом, но не имеет достаточно денег. Ее дом имеет плохое состояние как изнутри, так и снаружи. Ей необходимо срочно провести ремонт. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина, краски и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Mashrafkhon is a determined woman. She was born in 1966. Mashrafkhon is married and has one son. For more than six years, she has been working in a high school as a bookkeeper. Mashrafkhon has a specialized high school education. She honestly fulfills her job and has a good reputation among the local population. Her husband is a businessman. Mashrafkhon and her husband are gradually improving living conditions.

She plans to do repairs on her home, but does not have sufficient money. Her home is in poor condition both inside and out. It is in need of urgent repairs.

She is requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni to purchase building materials such as cement, wood, paint, and the like.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement, wood, and paint for home repairs

loans.name: Gevorg

texts.en:
Gevorg is 42 years old and he lives with his family in Norakert village of the Armavir region.  He is married and has two school-age children (ages 10 and 16). For five years, Gevorg has worked as a taxi driver using his own car. He mainly drives to Armavir-Yerevan and has a lot of customers. They prefer to use the taxi service that Gevorg provides since he drives attentively and carefully. Gevorg has applied for this loan to be able to rebuild automotive spare parts of his car. 

Gevorg has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan is very important for Gevorg to be able to continue providing taxi service and gain income for his family.

loans.use: to pay for rebuilding automotive spare parts

loans.name: Muhamadtohir

texts.ru:
Этого мужчину зовут Мухамадтохир. Ему всего 36 лет. Мухамадтохир живет в селе Шурбулок. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Мухамадтохир 15 лет своей жизни провел работая на земле зарабатывая деньги своим нажитым трудом. Он простой честный дехканин, который старается во благо своей семьи и народа.
     На данный момент у Махмадтохира финансовые проблемы ему не хватает денег, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения и семян. Чтобы совершить закупку он обратился за кредитом. Мухамадтохиру надо успеть посадить зимний урожай, если он не успеет, тогда весной у него не будет урожая. Выращивание и продажа овощей является единственным источником дохода в семье Мухамадтохира. Мухамадтохир очень надеется на Вашу помощь!
texts.en:
This man is called Muhamadtohir. He is only 36 years old. Muhamadtohir lives in the village Shurbulok. He is married and has three children. Muhamadtohir spent 15 years of his life working the land, earning money from his labor. He is a simple, honest farmer, who strives for the benefit of his family and people.

Currently, Muhamadtohir has financial problems. He does not have enough money to buy mineral fertilizers and seeds. In order to perform a purchase, he requested a loan. Muhamadtohir needs to successfully plan the winter crop. If he does not succeed, when spring comes he will have no crop. Growing and selling vegetables is the sole source of income for Muhamadtohir's family.

loans.use: to acquire mineral fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Barrio Lindo Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento BARRIO LINDO está compuesto por ocho integrantes seis mujeres y dos varones, todos ellos se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la señora Heidy tiene 32 años casada con cuatro hijos,  ella se dedica a la venta de jugos y refrescos de frutas naturales, ella vende sus productos de manera ambulante en la feria populosa de la zona de Barrio Lindo de ahí el nombre del Banco, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la señora Heidy va a usar este préstamo para compra de un frízer para mantener sus frutas y productos conservados,  la señora Heidy enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia y va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando  insumos y utensilios para ir mejorando su negocio  así de esta manera genera más ingresos económicos.
texts.en: The entrepreneurial bank "Barrio Lindo" consists of eight members, six women and two men. All work in different businesses. The president of the bank is Señora Heidy. She is 32 years old and is married, with four children. She sells juices and natural fruit drinks. She sells her products as a street vendor in the busy fair in the Barrio Lindo area, from which the name of the bank is taken. This loan is her first one with this institution. Señora Heidy is going to use this loan to buy a freezer to preserve her fruits and products. Señora Heidy faces challenges such as competition in her business. She is going to use the profits to continue buying ingredients and utensils to continue improving her business and in this way generate more income.

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Real Atahuallpa Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “REAL ATAHUALLPA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             
El socio Juan, tiene 31 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 03 hijos, el socio altera sus actividades diarias brindado el servicio  de taxi, el socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a esta actividad el cual le va bien gr4acias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su trabajo, él socio trabaja todos los días durante el día hasta las 10:00pm aproximadamente, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

El socio solicita el crédito para el mantenimiento de su carro.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de verduras, venta de salchipapas, restaurante, agricultura, venta de leña.

La socia que sale en la  foto adjunta pidió permiso para llegar tarde por motivos de salud.

La foto se tomo en dos grupos por motivos de trabajo.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These people belong to the “REAL ATAHUALLPA” communal bank, located in Cusco, belonging to the department and province of the same name. 
                                                                           
Juan is 31 years old. He is in a common-law relationship and has three children. Juan alternates his daily activities and his work with his taxi. He has been doing this for a long time and he feels that it is going well for him because of the determination which he daily applies to his work. He works every day, all during the day, sometimes until 10 pm. He wants to continue working like this so that he can continue to support his family. Juan is requesting a loan to do maintenance on his vehicle. 

The other members have businesses selling vegetables, selling salchipapas (a local fast food) running a restaurant, in agriculture and selling wood. The member in the small photo asked permission to arrive late for health reasons. The picture was taken in two groups due to their various work commitments.

Juan thanks all those that make these dream a reality through these loans and promises to make his installment payments on time.

loans.use: to do maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Mafanikio Group

texts.en:
Paskazia, who is in her early thirties, is married with three children, two boys and a daughter, who are in school. 

For four years now, she has been managing her life by running poultry activities (broilers). Paskazia is also doing a small business of selling vitumbua, a kind of snack made with rice flour. She works from 4:00 a.m. to 9:00 a.m. just for vitumbua, which is used as a breakfast bite.

In her poultry business, it is difficult to specify her working time because she just looks after them every time when they are chicks, even at night-hours, but when they become big, it is only in the morning and evening. Paskazia is able to make a very good profit per month.

This will be her second loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used her previous loan to buy more chicks and bought more sacks of chicken feed. Paskazia has paid back her loan successfully. She used her profit to pay school fees and household expenses, and reinvested in her poultry business. She also has a bank account where she normally saves some part of the profit. 

She will use this loan to buy more chicks for her poultry business. Paskazia dreams of reaching up to 1,500 chicks. 

She will share this loan with her loan group “Mafanikio", which totals three members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more chicks for her poultry business.

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia is 49 years of age, married and blessed with two children. Her husband is engaged in farming; his profits are insufficient to meet the family's daily consumption. Cresencia sells cooked food in their village.

Cresencia recognized her husband's hardship in just increasing their standard of living. She decided to engage herself in selling cooked foods and selling grocery items for additional income for the family. 

Cresencia's dream is to help her children finish their education and become professionals some day. She will manage her business well and expand it to increase her income so that she can provide for her children's needs. 

She believes that by borrowing 15,000 Philippine pesos, she will expand the products she sells and increase her income. She will use the loan to buy beverages, toothpaste,  shampoo, conditioner, canned goods, food ingredients and raw meat.

loans.use: To buy beverages, toothpaste, shampoo, conditioner, canned goods, food ingredients and raw meat.

loans.name: Regielyn

texts.en:
Regielyn manages a restaurant and catering services business. She is 38 years of age, married to a private employee and blessed with two children. 

Before, Regielyn sold meat and fish. When she got tired of that business and unsatisfied with the profits she earned, she decided to build a Karinderia (mini restaurant). 

At present, Regielyn has a gainful business and sufficient income to sustain her family's needs. So far, she plans to expand her business site, since her customer base has rapidly increased due to the good services she provides. 

She is requesting a loan of 20,000 Philippine pesos to buy meat, vegetables and raw ingredients for cooking food. She hopes for continued growth in her business for the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables and raw ingredients for cooking food.

loans.name: Wahid

texts.en:
Wahid, 23, is a single man who lives in Sana'a, Yemen. He has completed secondary school. He has always been concerned with community education and with providing for his family. 

Wahid has a taxi and has worked daily for two years. He is always looking for ways to provide the best for himself. The car he uses as a taxi needs maintenance, so he has applied for a loan of 100,000 Yemeni rial from Al-Amal Microfinance Bank to buy spare parts to use to repair his taxi. 

In the future, he hopes to buy a new car to increase his profits and improve his living standards.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for repairing his taxi.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is married with two children, both of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She operates a bricks-selling business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.  Her dream is to establish a rental house in the near future. 

With the 50,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase more bricks for sale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase more bricks for sale.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en:
Meet 37-year-old Zainab from Waterloo, Eastern area, in Freetown. She is married with three children. 

She began her business because she wants to develop her family.  Thirteen years ago, Zainab established her articles business.  She works at the business for twelve hours per day, seven days per week. She says that her business is doing well. Out of the business, she is able to take care of her children.

Zainab requires a loan in order to purchase more items like rings, bracelets, necklaces and face powder. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and have a permanent business location. 

In the future, Zainab plans to own the biggest shop in the community. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more items like rings, bracelets, necklaces and face powder.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos, él es un hombre  muy responsable quien siempre está en miras de mejorar su estabilidad económica. El trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan francés y pan dulce, el cual elabora él solo a primeras horas para poder venderlo antes del desayuno, que es cuando las personas más lo consumen al igual que en la cena. El cliente  solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para contar con la ayuda necesaria para invertir en la compra de harina, levadura, manteca, latas y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para él puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: This borrower lives with his wife and two children. He is a very responsible man who is always looking for ways to improve his economic stability. He works in his own bakery, where he makes French bread and sweet bread, which he makes alone in the early hours to be able to sell it before breakfast, which is when people eat it most, as much as at dinner. This borrower is applying to Integral for a loan to have the help necessary to invest in the purchase of flour, leavening, lard, baking pans, and everything necessary to be able to produce more. This project of improvement for his bakery is very important for him, since in this way he will improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy flour, leavening, lard, and baking pans

loans.name: Iroda

texts.ru: Ирода клиентка Арванда с большим стажем. Ирода более десяти лет как сотрудничает с организацией. Ирода занимается продажей продуктов, а точнее сладостями и конфетами. Она стремительная, жизнерадостная девушка. На работу она как на праздник ходит. Ведь в ее ассортименте продаж имеются те продукты  вкуснятины которые часто приносят улыбку и радость людям. Бизнес у Ироды развивается хорошо. Ироду всегда поддерживают ее родители, они занимаются выращиванием риса вместе с семьей в том числе сама Ирода тоже помогает им в свободное время от работы. До сегодняшнего дня Ирода пока что не создала семью. Она хочет стать успешной бизнес-леди и реализовать его устойчиво. Ирода повторно подала заявку на кредит, хочет брать денежные средства  в кредит  для оборота.Она планирует закупить печенье и конфет.   Ирода выражает свою благодарность МДО "Арванд" за поддержку и понимание.
texts.en:
Iroda is a customer of Arvand with a lot of experience. For more than ten years, Iroda has been collaborating with the organization. Iroda is involved in selling products, more specifically sweets and candy. She is a fast-moving, cheerful, young woman. She goes to work like she is going on holiday. After all, in her assortment of products are those yummy products that often bring smiles and joy to people. Iroda's business is developing well. Iroda always supports her parents; they are involved in growing rice together with the family and Iroda herself also helps them in her free time from work. To date, Iroda still has not started a family. She wants to become a successful businesswoman and to reach stability.

Iroda has repeatedly applied for loans and wants to take money on credit for a turnaround. She plans to buy cookies and candy. Iroda expresses her appreciation to MDO Arvand for the support and understanding.

loans.use: to buy  sweets

loans.name: Zulaykho

texts.en:
Zulaykho lives in a rural village with her husband and four children. The family gathers its income from farming. They cultivate carrots, wheat, etc. This farming activity is the only source of income for the family. 

Zulaykho has been busy with this business for more than 10 years. Her husband helps her grow wheat and carrots. She sells her harvest at the local market in her village. Her customers appreciate her products because of their high quality. 

Zulaykho wants to do her autumn sowing, but she has no money to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers. She is asking for a loan of 3,000 Tajikistani somoni with the aim of buying seeds and mineral fertilizers. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Tornike

texts.en:
Tornike is 32 years old and lives in the village of Sakulia, West Georgia. He is married and lives with his wife, father-in-law and an infant son. 

Tornike grows various greens and vegetables in his small greenhouse and sells the harvest locally. In addition, he breeds a milk cow and two calves and takes good care of his livestock. His earnings are modest and hardly enough to cover daily expenses. That’s why Tornike decided to apply for this loan to expand his greenhouse business. 

He is very grateful for the support that the Kiva lenders are offering him, since thanks to their help, he will be able to purchase all the needed materials for his greenhouse construction. He plans to grow various greens in wintertime and plant tomatoes and cucumbers in summer. He will sell his harvest the whole year and generate income. 

Thanks to this loan, he will improve their quality of life and increase the family funds. Tornike awaits your support.

loans.use: to construct a greenhouse.

loans.name: Anita

texts.es:
Anita es una señora de 47 años, casada, madre de dos hijas una estudiando en la universidad en la ciudad de León y otra en estudios de secundaria.
Habita en el municipio de El Sauce donde ha vivido toda su vida, estudió la carrera de Magisterio y hoy se desempeña como directora de un centro escolar de la localidad donde tiene más de veinte años de servicio.
Se siente orgullosa de ser maestra porque es una profesión muy valiosa donde de ellas aprenden muchos jóvenes y niños que son el futuro de Nicaragua, además la escuela es su segunda casa porque comparte muchas cosas con las demás maestras y alumnos.
Anita está solicitando un crédito a Kiva a través de Ceprodel para Compra de medicamentos, pago de consultas médicas y realización de exámenes, ya que últimamente se ha sentido mal de salud y con este financiamiento y la ayuda de Dios quiere mejorar su salud.
Solicita a los inversionistas de Kiva le apoyen con su solicitud para llevar a cabo su inversión donde les agradecerá eternamente porque estos créditos son de gran ayuda para la persona de escasos recursos que ganan solamente para el pan de cada día
texts.en:
Anita is a 47 year old woman. She is married and the mother of two children. One of them is studying at University in the city of Leon and the other is in Secondary School.

She lives in the municipality of El Sauce, where she has lived all her life. She studied to be a teacher and today she is the director of a local school where she has dedicated more than twenty years of service. She is proud to be a teacher as it a very valuable profession. She teaches many children and youth who are the future of Nicaragua. Besides the school is her second home as she shares many things with her fellow teachers and students.

Anita is requesting a loan from Kiva through Ceprodel to buy medicine, pay for visits to the doctor, and medical tests. She has not been feeling well lately and with this loan and the will of God she hopes to improve her health.

Anita asks that the lenders at Kiva support her in her request to carry out this investment. She is eternally grateful as these loans are a great help to people of limited resources that work to make their daily bread.

loans.use: to buy medicine, pay for visits to the doctor and for medical tests.

loans.name: Vidal

texts.en:
Despite the hardship of living, Vidal has the determination to uplift his status of living. He is 48 and has two children. He earns a living through farming. He also operates his motorcycle as transport to generate additional income. He aims to earn and save more income in order to provide for the necessities of his family. 

Due to insufficient funds, he is asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP [Philippines pesos] to buy wheels, gasoline and spare parts needed for the maintenance of his motorcycle. Through this loan, he believes that he will make improvements in the business as well as their status of living.

loans.use: to buy wheels, gasoline and spare parts needed for the maintenance of his motorcycle.

loans.name: Primitiva

texts.en:
Primitiva, 64, is from Lawaan, Aloran, Misamis Occidental, Mindanao, in the Philippines. She is married and blessed with four children. 

Out of her desire to help her family, she engaged in a buy-and-sell business to earn a living; the business has been operating for two years. 

Now, she is applying for a loan of 13,000 Philippine pesos from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative, of which she is a member and enjoys member privileges. She will use the loan to purchase construction and raw materials needed for a house repair. The income from her business will pay off the loan that she has requested. 

Primitiva dreams of nothing more than to have a decent living, a happy and healthy life with her family and an adequate income from her business.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for a house repair

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en: Joyce appreciates her previous Kiva loan that improved her living standards, enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income.  She is requesting a loan of 50,000 ksh to purchase water pipes for her business.  She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase water pipes for her business.

loans.name: Mohtaram

texts.en:
Mohtaram is 26 years of age. He is a married person. He is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with his family in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. For the past five years, he has been raising sheep because mutton is in high demand in this region. His monthly income from this business is 190 AZN [Azerbaijani New Manat]. This is a very profitable business, and he is doing it together with his wife.

Mohtaram is keeping a flock of sheep in his own yard. He fattens them and takes their meat to the central bazaar, where butchers and customers purchase from him. People use mutton for traditional dishes like kababs, dolmas, pilovs, etc.

He requires 500 AZN in order to buy feed for his sheep. Mohterem awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy feed to his sheep.

loans.name: Shafahat

texts.en:
Shafahat is 53-years-old. He is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with his family in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement.  He earns a living by breeding cows and cattle and sells their milk and milk products, as well as meat to local butchers. He has thirty years of experience in this field, thanks to his father who taught him how to look after cattle. 

Shafahat usually buys small cows, raises and fattens them for five to six months and then resells them for a more profitable price to butchers. He sells milk and yogurt to neighbors. He earns about 180 AZN a month, in part because milk, yogurt, and meat are very popular products in Azerbaijan. People use meat in everyday national dishes, such as pilau and dolma, and always use yogurt. Milk products are seen as very healthy and are used daily. 

Because his family has only one source of income, he is requesting a loan for 1200 AZN to buy three cattle and two milk cows. This will be his second loan. He has a good client history and plans to use the additional income he earns to care for his family.

loans.use: to buy three cattle and two milk cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction and insulation materials for her house

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en:
Shehnaz is 48-year-old married woman. She is a mother of five children. She adores her family, and her husband works very hard so that his family can have a good and respectable life. Her husband dyes clothes, and with the earned amount, he meets the family's needs. This is the only source of income for the family. Presently, he needs money to purchase a variety of dyeing colors for his shop. 

For that purpose, Shehnaz is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband, so that he can respond quickly to customer needs. Shehnaz hopes that the loan will be helpful for her husband's business. She is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of dyeing colors for her husband's clothes-dyeing shop.

loans.name: Abbass

texts.en:
Abbass, who is 27 years old, is an Iraqi youth client who is married and has a single child. He is the only provider in the family. Abbass owns a small shop selling mobile phones and their accessories. In his shop, he has a wide collection of all known mobiles in the market and also all their accessories, like headsets and covers. He also provides services like downloading music and ringtones as well as selling charging cards. 

He established his business in 2005, and since then, he has been well known in the market and has gained a good reputation. Abbass is requesting a $2,400 youth loan. This loan will be used to buy a motor generator for his shop and to install a new display window. Abbass aims to grow his business and increase his assets so he may provide more services and make more income to provide his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a motor generator for his shop and to install a new display window

loans.name: Minh

texts.en:
Minh, 36 years old, is married and has two children. Her husband earns a living working as a farmer. Minh supports her family through the income she earns from selling sugar cane juice and soft drinks. She began this business four years ago. She lives in Ho Chi Minh City. 

Minh intends to take a loan to increase her working capital and buy a larger quantity of sugar cane and soft drinks. The additional purchasing will enable her to increase her sales. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sugar cane and soft drinks

loans.name: Alexander Jose

texts.es: José es originario de la ciudad de Chinandega; de 30 años de edad, soltero y padre de un hijo. Él tiene un negocio de auto lavado que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado obtener. Inicio lavando autos desde hace 2 años con pocas herramientas; con un balde, una manguera y toallas, cumplía con lavar y secar carros. Poco a poco ha logrado superarse y obtener una máquina de secar autos y una pulidora. Actualmente cuenta con ayudantes debido a la alta demanda de clientes. Solicita un crédito para comprar  productos varios como: jabón líquido,  cera, aromatizantes, otra máquina para secar autos entre otros, con el fin de brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que crecerá su negocio y aumentara la demanda de sus servicios. Su plan futuro es mejorar la infraestructura de su negocio y brindar un servicio completo como cambio de aceite, lavado de motor etc.
texts.en:
José is a native of Chinandega. He is 30 years old, single and the father of one child. He has a car wash business that he created through a lot of effort. He started washing cars two years ago with few tools. He managed to wash and dry cars with a bucket, hose and towels. Little by little he has been moving ahead and he has obtained a dryer and polisher for cars. Today he has assistants due to the high demand from clients. 

José is requesting a loan to buy a variety of products like soap, wax, air fresheners, another machine for drying cars, etc. He wants to provide better services to his customers. He believes this loan will be of great assistance, expanding his business and increasing the demand for his services. His plans for the future are to improve his business' infrastructure and offer complete services like oil changes and steaming cleaning motors.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products like soap, wax, air fresheners, another machine for drying cars, etc.

loans.name: Erika Elena

texts.es: Erika es una humilde señora originaria de la ciudad de Chinandega, casada y madre de dos hijos. De 34 años de edad. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa usada. Inicio este negocio arduamente desde hace cinco años con una pequeña paca de ropa. Actualmente vende ropa usada de manera ambulante, sale a vender diario en un triciclo  a ofrecerles a sus clientes en las zonas de la ciudad. Solicita el crédito para comprar pacas de ropa usada al por mayor, con el fin de aumentar la mercadería y ofrecerles a sus clientes más cantidades de ropa. Estima que el crédito le será beneficioso ya que podrá cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes e incrementar sus ventas. Su plan futuro es  mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.
texts.en: Thirty-four-year-old Erika is a humble woman from the city of Chinandega.  She is married and a mother to two children.  Erika is a business woman and makes a living selling used clothes.  She started this business five years ago, with a small pack of clothes.  She now sells used clothes as a street vendor.  She goes out on a tricycle every day in order to sell to her customers in the various areas around the city.  Erika is applying for a loan in order to buy packs of used clothes in bulk, so that she can increase her merchandise and offer her customers larger quantities of clothes.  Erika expects that this loan will be beneficial to her as she will be able to meet her customers' demand and increase her sales.  Erika's plan for the future is to improve her home.

loans.use: to buy packs of used clothes in bulk.

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es:
La Señora. Luz es una socia fundadora del banco comunal Nueva Amistad, lleva algunos años siendo parte del este hermoso grupo en donde cuenta con muy buenas amigas y vecinas. Vive por la parroquia de Cumbe en Cuenca, es un hermoso lugar gracias a su geografía, es de clima frió, pero de un corazón muy cálido de sus habitantes, su gente es amable y cordial, se dedican en su mayoría a la crianza de animales y a la agricultura, aun mantienen vivas las llamas de su cultura y tradiciones.
La Señora Luz tiene 63 años de edad, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos quienes son mayores de edad y le ayudan en la económicamente, su esposo es de profesión sastre, la casa en la que vive es propia.
Doña Luz se dedica a la agricultura y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su hogar y si existe un sobrante lo vende, también cría cerdos, cuyes, gallinas y ganado. 
Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de cerdos, gallinas, alimento para animales y semillas para sus cultivos. Su sueño es tener animales de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Luz is a founding member of the Nueva Amistad community bank. She was a member of this wonderful group in which she has great friends and neighbors for a few years. She lives in the Cumbe Parish in Cuenca which is a beautiful place thanks to its geography. Its climate is cold but its inhabitants have a very warm heart. Its people are warm and friendly and dedicate themselves mostly to animal husbandry and agriculture who still keep the flame of their culture and traditions alive. 

Luz is 63-years-old, married, and conceived two children in their union. They are older and help economically. Her husband is a professional tailor. The house they live in is their own. 

Doña Luz makes her living in agriculture and her harvests are for home consumption. If there is a surplus, she sells it. She also raises pigs, guinea pigs, hens, and cattle. She will invest her loan in the purchase of pigs, hens, animal feed, and seeds for her crops. Her dream is to have better quality animals.

loans.use: to purchase pigs, hens, animal feed, and seeds for her crops.

loans.name: Cristino

texts.es:
Cristino tiene 67 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Sallique, su población se dedica a la agricultura ganadería y al comercio, a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, sierra norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposa tienen un puesto de venta de comida preparada, son conocidos en la zona por el buen gusto de cada plato que ofrecen, su negocio está ubicado en el centro de su comunidad, en un espacio de su puesto venden abarrotes.

El ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para hacer crecer su bodeguita comprando arroz, leche, menestras y así generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Cristino is 67 years old. He lives with his wife and children in the district of Salique, where the people raise livestock and work in commerce. It is located two hours from the city of Jaén, in the northern mountains of Peru.

Together with his wife, he has a stand where he sells prepared foods. They are known in the area for the good flavor of each dish that they offer. Their business is located in the center of their community. In one part of their stand, they sell groceries.

He has applied for a loan of 2000 PEN to expand his grocery store, buying rice, milk, and beans [to sell] and thus generating greater income for his family.

loans.use: to buy groceries for his store -- milk, beans, and rice

loans.name: Gulgaaky

texts.ru: Гулгаакы 38 лет. Совместно с супругом Гулгаакы растит троих детей. Гулгаакы в поисках доходов для своей семьи начала небольшой бизнес по пошиву приданного для девушек на выданье, а также шьет национальные изделия для продажи туристам с 2009 года, стартовав с суммы 50,000 сом (KGS). Бизнес очень хороший, а самое главное Гулгаакы с удовольствием занимается своей работой-шитьем, которое приносит ей ежемесячный доход в сумме 5,500 сом (KGS). Супруг помогает Гулгаакы в этом деле, он гладит готовые изделия. Также Гулгаакы дополнительно занимается животноводством и полеводством в хозяйстве у нее имеется: 1 дойная корова с теленком и 15 овец, а также имеет земельный надел мерою 0,29 ГА на котором выращивает картофель.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса по пошиву, Гулгаакы обратилась в микрофинансовый Банк «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом, в сумме 80 000 сом(KGS) на покупку  материалов и тканей для шитья. На доходы от кредита Гулгаакы хочет расширить бизнес и дать детям хорошее образование.
texts.en:
Gulgaaky is 38 years old.  She and her husband are raising three children.  As she was looking for a source of income to support her family, she started a small sewing business.  She makes dowries for young women of marriageable age and also sews traditional items which she sells to tourists.  She launched this business in 2009, with an initial amount of 50,000 som (KGS).  Her business is going very well, and most importantly, she loves her sewing job, from which she makes a monthly income of 5,500 som (KGS).  Gulgaaky's husband helps her with this business by ironing her finished products.

Gulgaaky is also involved is animal husbandry and agriculture and she owns a dairy cow, a calf, as well as 15 sheep.  She also cultivates 0.29 hectare (0.71 acre) of land on which she grows potatoes.  

In order to further develop her sewing business, Gulgaaky has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai Tushum & Partners" and requested a loan of 80,000 som (KGS). She will use this loan to buy some materials and fabrics for sewing.  She plans to use the profits from this loan to expand her business and to give a good education to her children.

loans.use: to buy some materials and fabrics for sewing.

loans.name: Kubra

texts.en:
Kubra is a 57-year-old married woman. She is a mother of eight children. She is a hardworking housewife. Her husband is a chain maker. He has a small chain selling shop in the community market. He manufactures chains of various sizes and sells them in the market. 

Presently, he needs to buy iron goods to make the chains. However, due to lack of money, he finds it difficult. Therefore, to help her husband Kubra has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase the necessary items. With the profits, she will pay the household expenses, put aside some savings, and pay utility bills.

Kubra is hopeful that the loan will be a productive one for them.

loans.use: to buy iron goods to make chains

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia is a 45-year-old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been filling pillows using a machine for many years in a small industry. Now that he has gained maximum experience, he wants to start a business of his own. But he does not have enough money to buy the machine to fill the pillows
.
Therefore, Razia requested a loan for her husband to buy the machine. In this way, he can fill the pillows to sell in the market and make enough income to contribute to his family's livelihood.

She is the mother of seven children and it is too tough to feed all of them three times in a day. She is required to provide them with good food, health, and education also. She expects a boost in earnings and wishes to spend part of the profits on the expansion of the business.

Razia is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy a machine to fill pillows with cotton and fiber

loans.name: Carmen Jovana

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 45 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Camaná y para poder salir adelante trabaja como obrera en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, con lo cual puede llevar un sustento para su hogar y poder sacar adelante a su familia.

Carmen esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar enseres para  su vivienda y de esta manera poder mejorar la calidad de vida para su familia y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Carmen is 45 years old. She lives in the city of Camaná and works on a farming estate there in order to get ahead. Carmen says that her work allows her to provide for her family.

Carmen is grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help they have given her, she will be able to buy essential items for her home. She says that this will improve her family’s quality of life and allow her to keep fighting to make her greatest dream a reality, which is to give her children an education so that they can become professionals.

loans.use: to buy household essentials.

loans.name: Tung

texts.en: Tung is a 50-year-old married man living in Ho Chi Minh City. He has two children. He and his wife earn a living running a general store, which they have done for five years. Tung would like to take a loan to buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods, such as dishwashing liquid, shampoos and different kind of beverages, to stock his general store. He hopes this will enable him to better meet the needs of his customers and increase the turnover of his business. He also hopes that through the loan his business will generate a higher income and will help him to improve his family's living conditions and enable him to set aside some savings.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods, such as dishwashing liquid, shampoos and different kind of beverages, to stock his general store.

loans.name: Haydar

texts.en:
Haydar is an Iraqi youth client who is 22 years old, single, and lives with his parents and two brothers. Haydar, his father, and his two brothers together provide the family income.

Haydar owns a small grocery store selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents, and snacks. He established his business in 2011, and now he has hired an employee. He has built up good experience in this field, and is becoming well known in the surrounding area with an excellent reputation. 

Haydar is requesting a sum of $3,000 as a youth loan to buy two new refrigerators and three new freezers. 

He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy two new refrigerators and three new freezers.

loans.name: Herman

texts.es:
Hernán tiene 57 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Nanchoc, ubicado en la Provincia de San Miguel, su población se dedica al cultivo de café, maíz, cereales, a dos horas de la ciudad de Cajamarca.

Su esposa se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral patos, pollos, tienen una pequeña bodeguita que venden cerveza, El ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para compara abarrotes para abastecer su negocio para la fiesta de Nanchoc y de esta manera generar ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Hernan is 57 years old, and he lives together with his wife and children in the Nanchoc District, in the Province of San Miguel, where people work growing coffee, corn, and grains, about two hours from the city of Cajamarca. 

His wife works raising and selling livestock such as ducks and chickens, and they also run a small store where they sell beer. Hernan is requesting this loan of 1,000 nuevos Soles in order to purchase groceries to restock his business ahead of the local Nanchoc fiesta. In this way he will generate extra income for his family.

loans.use: purchase grocery items for his business.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita is a 33-year-old married mother of two children who has been working as an accountant;  for 13 years, she also has been typing books and many other documents, and doing research from her house.

Rita is a hard worker, she provides her services to many customers in a well managed way.

Rita is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to buy a new upgraded and advanced computer that will make her work easier, and to start a new childrens clothing business from her house.

This newly established business will reflect positively on increasing her family's income, and improving their living, too.

She hopes that one day she'll be able to open a copy center, a children's  clothing shop, and recruit others to help her in managing the increasing number of customers.

loans.use: To buy a new upgraded and advanced computer that will make her work easier, and start a new childrens clothing business from her house

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more perfumes and accessories to sell

loans.name: Nargis

texts.en:
Nargis is a 27-year-old woman. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan, and is a mother of four children. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. 

For the last few days, his rickshaw has not been working properly so he is unable to generate any amount of income; he wants to repair it as soon as possible. However due to the lack of money, he finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. 

Nargis has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. 

Nargis is very thankful to Kiva.

loans.use: to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es: Luis es un campesino de 65 años de edad, que desde niño ha estado involucrado en las actividades del campo, mientras le ayudaba a su padre en las labores de la finca. Allí aprendió todo lo relacionado con el cuidado de los animales, especialmente del ganado lechero; gracias a ello, en el año 1997 inició su propio negocio de producción y comercialización de leche, en el que trabajaba solo y sus principales clientes eran los vecinos de la zona donde reside; pero debido a la baja en los precios de venta del líquido su negocio se quebró y tuvo que vender las vacas, desde entonces ha pasado por diversas crisis económicas que afectan también a su familia. Sin embargo, su empuje, tenacidad y la necesidad de salir adelante lo motivan a solicitar el apoyo del préstamo para ajustar el dinero para comprar una vaca productora de leche, pues desea reactivar su actividad comercial para poder llevar el sustento a su familia, conformada por su esposa y su único hijo; con esto tendrá la oportunidad de seguir luchando por el bienestar de las personas que ama y la posibilidad de cumplir su sueño de crear un negocio grande y rentable, que le ofrezca la opción de mejorar su economía y dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida hasta que Dios y su cuerpo se lo permitan.
texts.en:
Luis is a rural resident who is 65 years old. From the time he was a boy, Luis has been involved in agricultural work since he helped his father with the tasks around the farm. He learned everything about caring for animals, especially dairy cows. Thanks to this experience, he started his own business of producing and selling milk in 1997. Luis works alone and his main customers are his neighbors in the area where he lives. Due to low milk prices, his business went bankrupt and he had to sell his cows. Going through several financial crises has also affected his family.

Nonetheless, his drive and tenacity led him to request the support of this loan, which will provide the money to buy a milk-producing cow. Luis wants to restart his business so that he can support his family, which consists of his wife and their only child. Having this opportunity will enable him to continue striving for the welfare of those he loves. He will also have the opportunity to fulfill his dream of creating a large and profitable business. As a result, Luis will have the option to improve financially and to provide better living conditions as much as God and his body will allow.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Tu

texts.en:
Tu is 58 years old and married with three children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns income as a farmer. Tu sells flowers and vases to earn a living. 

She started her business eight years ago. She intends to take a loan to buy a variety of different flowers and vases to sell to her customers. This will enable her to increase the size of her business and earn a higher income. 

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a variety of different vases and flowers to sell

loans.name: Osvaldo

texts.es:
Osvaldo es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Curuguaty, y comenta que se dedica a la construcción de obras, además es dueño de un salón comercial que se encuentra en alquiler, y al lado mismo está construyendo un nuevo salón para su bar, ese fue un emprendimiento que siempre quiso y que hoy quiere hacer realidad.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de materiales de construcción, para que de esa forma pueda seguir con la construcción de su bar y poder cumplir su anhelado sueño. Quiere comprar cemento ladrillos, varillas de hierros y demás.
texts.en:
Osvaldo is single and lives in the city of Curuguaty. He says that he makes a living as a construction worker, and in addition is the owner of a commercial space which he rents. Next to the space he is building a new room for a bar. This was an undertaking he always dreamed of and today he wants to make it a reality.

He is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of construction materials, so that he can continue building his bar and achieve his cherished dream. He wants to buy cement blocks, iron rods and other materials.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a bar.

loans.name: Dalma

texts.es:
Dalma como estudiante siempre fue dedicada, optimista, responsable esmerándose en lo que desea. Su familia es trabajadora, luchando siempre por pagar los estudios y alimentarla. Como meta tiene recibirme de Bioquímica, especializarse en lo que me gusta y poder trabajar. Como inspiración tiene a su  familia y aspira trabajar como Bioquímica haciendo siempre lo que en verdad me gusta.
Pide este crédito para invertirlo en los gastos de su universidad y así seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Dalma as a student has always been dedicated, optimistic, responsible and attained excellence in whatever she wanted to. Her family is hard-working, always struggling to pay her studies and feed her. "As a goal I want to graduate in Bio-chemistry, specializing in what I enjoy and can work in". 

As inspiration she has her family. She wants to work as a Bio-chemist doing what she really wants to do. She is requesting this loan to invest it in her university expenses and be able to continue studying.

loans.use: to pay university expenses.

loans.name: Samina

texts.en:
Samina is 45 years old, living with her three children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been running a mobile shop for many years and earns sufficient income. However, he now wants to sell mobile accessories such as chargers, phone bodies, batteries, and data cables.

Demand for mobile accessories has increased recently, so sometimes Samina's husband has to refuse his customers.  He does not have savings to further invest in his business because he has spent all his income on household expenses.  Therefore, Samina (pictured) has requested a loan for her husband so he can buy additional mobile accessories. 

Samina thanks Kiva and its field partner for this honorable support.

loans.use: to buy mobile accessories such as chargers, batteries and data cable to sell.

loans.name: Ba

texts.en:
Ba, age 66, is married and has three children.  She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City.  She and her husband earn an income running a coffee shop in front of their house.

She started this business eight years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of coffee and soft drink products to stock in her shop and better satisfy her customers.

She hopes that her business will run smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of coffee and soft drink products to stock in her shop.

loans.name: Hung

texts.en:
Hung, 36, is married and has two children. He lives with his family in Ho Chi Minh City. He and his wife earn an income as farmers. They raise cows. Hung started this job 15 years ago.  

He is requesting a loan to buy one more cow and feed. 

He hopes his business runs smoothly, and will generate a higher income to assist him in improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy one more cow and feed

loans.name: Loi

texts.en:
Loi is a 46-year-old married man with two children; he lives with his family in Ho Minh City. 

For the past seven years, he and his wife have supported their family by running a food stall in front of their house. They sell noodles with beef. 

Loi would like to get a loan to buy better quality food, such as beef, noodles, and beverages to sell in his stall to better meet his customer's needs. 

He hopes that he will be able to increase his income, and set aside some savings through the loan.

loans.use: to buy better quality food, such as beef, noodles, and beverages to sell in his stall to better meet his customer's needs

loans.name: Phuong

texts.en:
Phuong, 53, lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City with her family, including two sons and her husband. Phuong and her husband earn money through their business selling artificial and dried flowers. 

Phuong would like to get a loan to buy a larger stock of material to increase her flower production to meet her customer's needs. 

She hopes her business will ensure that her family members, and especially her children, will have a better education and a better future.

loans.use: to buy a larger stock of material to increase her flower production to meet her customer's needs.

loans.name: Thao

texts.en:
Thao, 32, lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City with her family, including two daughters, one son, and her husband. 

Thao and her husband earn money through their business manufacturing slippers. Thao is sometimes unable to provide the volume of slippers required by her customers. 

Consequently, she would like to get a loan to buy a larger stock of material to make slippers, and increase her production to meet her customer's needs. 

She hopes her business will ensure that her family members, and especially her children, will have a better education and a better future.

loans.use: to buy a larger stock of material to make slippers.

loans.name: Koety Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  Koeti  está compuesto   por  15  integrantes, donde en este ciclo solo 14 retiran de crédito, están en  el 2°  del programa de comité de mujeres. Ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, para poder superarla y crecer.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra.  Felipa, quien por medio de su despensa trabaja y ayuda a su familia para poder darles todo lo que necesitan para poder crecer. Es una persona muy trabajadora, que tiene como meta poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de quesos, huevos, carne, verduras y demás insumos para poder seguir con sus ventas y dar a sus clientes lo mejor.
texts.en:
The group known as Koeti  is made up of 15 members, though in this cycle only 14 members are taking a loan. They are in their second cycle for this women's group program. They make up part of the Poverty Stoplight program and strive to get ahead and grow. 

One of the members of this group is Felipa, who works through her store in order to help her family and provide them with everything they need in order to thrive. She is a very hardworking person whose goal is to improve the living conditions of her family. She is requesting this loan in order to purchase cheeses, eggs, meats, vegetables, and other items for her store to continue making sales and providing the best for her customers.

loans.use: purchase cheeses, eggs, meats, vegetables, and other items.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El comité “San Cayetano” es de la ciudad de Santaní, distante a varios kilómetros de la ciudad de Asunción, es una zona eminentemente rural, donde todas y cada una de las integrantes está luchando por mejorar  sus vidas y hacer que la zona donde viven vaya mejorando cada vez más.
Todas se dedican a la actividad agrícola de cría y venta de animales de corral y por medio de esta actividad quieren ayudar a su familia, para poder darles lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
Brigida es una de ellas, quien pide de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para sus animales, y así seguir trabajando y criando a los animales para la venta.
texts.en:
